attributes.action: More Ski lifts in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We need more Ski lifts in the UK. It will make the inaccesible for many people accessible. I appreciate there are a few in Scotland but south Wales and the south west need more Ski Lifts. It will be Great for mountain bikers, walkers and for sight seeing.Its a brillant way for people to get out into the country side which is great for your health and Fitness. Tourism in the area will also thrive as a result.

Please sign this petition and show yuor support. We only need 100,000 signitures.
